short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing DDG Image Proxy Redirect, designed to enhance your browsing experience by ensuring uninterrupted access to images, evenâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing DDG Image Proxy Redirect, designed to enhance your browsing experience by ensuring uninterrupted access to images, even when direct link picture hosting sites are blocked by your firewall. This extension seamlessly redirects blocked image URLs to a proxied version using DuckDuckGo's reliable image proxy service. 

Whether you're navigating through websites for research, leisure, or work, our extension guarantees that you can view all images without any hindrance. With just a simple installation, you'll never have to worry about missing out on visual content due to firewall restrictions. Enjoy a smooth and hassle-free browsing experience with our efficient and user-friendly solution.
